column4: Failed Hard Drive, need some help with recovery of data. Failed hard drive is a SATA drive with PATA adaptor with Ubuntu 10.04.1 installed as the OS for x86 platform.  Have the drive plugged into my amd64 PC direct SATA, no adaptor.  I cannot open the file system of the failed hard drive.  I would like to recent work that I did not back up before failure.
